sentences.en: "We've got life-size cutouts of William and Kate, " boasts one headmistress, claiming: "The children are really excited."
sentences.cn: “我们制作了真人大小的威廉和凯特的人像，”一名女校长沾沾自喜地炫耀着：“孩子们可兴奋了。”

sentences.en: And yet you could never envisage Chaddy as headmistress of an outstanding school.
sentences.cn: 可是你难以想象查迪能当一所著名学校的校长.

sentences.en: I met the headmistress in the hall.
sentences.cn: 我在大厅里碰到了女校长.

sentences.en: I was called to account for my conduct by the headmistress.
sentences.cn: 我因为行为不检点而受到女校长的斥责.

sentences.en: I was introduced to the new headmistress yesterday. I can't say I took to her.
sentences.cn: 昨天我被介绍给新来的女校长. 我很难说我对她有好感.

sentences.en: In 1987 the school headmistress referred the case to the Institute of Child Health at University College London.
sentences.cn: 1987年，学校校长将这些儿童的案例提交至伦敦大学学院儿童健康研究所。

sentences.en: She is the deputy headmistress of the school.
sentences.cn: 她是那所学校的代理校长.

sentences.en: The headmistress informed us that the school would is closed for one day next week.
sentences.cn: 女校长告诉我们下星期学校将停一天课.

sentences.en: The headmistress smiled and cough. Her pale face flushed. That's no use!
sentences.cn: 校长笑得发着咳嗽, 那贫血的面孔立刻旋动着红的颜色: “ 不必了!

sentences.en: The headmistress spoke at some ( ie considerable ) length.
sentences.cn: ( 女 ) 校长讲话讲了好一会儿.

sentences.en: The headmistress spoke at some length.
sentences.cn: 校长讲话讲了好一会儿.

sentences.en: The headmistress was an Oxford woman.
sentences.cn: 女校长毕业于牛津大学。

sentences.en: The now headmistress is packing up her desk, and finds the old camera in a cupboard.
sentences.cn: 此时女校长在收拾她的桌子, 她在她的茶橱里发现了那个老照相机.

sentences.en: The other victims included the school's headmistress and six pupils -- five boys and a girl.
sentences.cn: 其他的受害者包括学校的女校长和六名学生 -- 五名男生和一名女生.

sentences.en: The portraits are duty - bound to serve the current ( accepted ) Headmaster Headmistress ( OP 22 ).
sentences.cn: 这些肖像对于时所承认的现任校长有一层义务( OP22 ).

sentences.en: When I was growing up in the colony of Hong Kong, my British headmistress would glare when we asked to learn Chinese, and hiss: “If you want to learn Chinese, go onto the streets!”
sentences.cn: 我成长在当时还是英国殖民地的香港，我的英籍女校长对我们要求学习中文的请求不屑一顾，并嘶声说道：“如果你想学习中文，就到街上去！”

trans.tran_en: a female teacher who is in charge of a school
